data.title: What is the capital of Mauritius, discovered by the Portuguese in 1505?
data.text:
What country's cuisine includes dishes such as red beet soup, kielbasa, and pierogi (dumplings)?

Geography Trivia / August 19, 2024

Poland. In Polish cuisine, kielbasa is a smoked sausage.

Which capital city was once the capital of a Spanish colony called New Granada?

Geography Trivia / August 19, 2024

Bogota. Bogota became the capital of Columbia in 1819.

Which of these countries has only one capital?

Geography Trivia / August 18, 2024

Maldives. South Africa has Cape Town, Pretoria and Johannesburg; Bolivia has La Paz and Sucre; Netherlands has The Hague and Amsterdam; Poor Maldives have only Male.

What is defined as a narrow, jagged mountain crest or ridge?

Geography Trivia / August 18, 2024

Arete. Aretes are the remnants of the heads of glaciers that started in cirques.

What is the state flower of Florida?

Geography Trivia / August 17, 2024

Orange Blossom. The state bird of Florida is the mockingbird and the state tree is the sabal palmetto.
